channel.title: Every Server is Down Almost All the Time!
channel.description:
When I go to moparisthebest.com, the game loads up fine. Whenever I enter an ip and port number, I get "Error connecting to server. Must be down." (even when I start my own server). This doesn't come up all the time though. I usually get to play for a few minutes before it kicks me off. When I do get kicked off, I usually have to wait a day or two before I can play again.
I have tried the following internet browsers: Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Apple Safari, and Opera. I have tried getting on on three different computers as well. I made sure that all the browsers and the Java I have installed were up to date. No matter what i try, I get the same problem. I know the servers aren't down because this happens with every single one even if they are on the server status page. Please help me figure this out.

item.title: Every Server is Down Almost All the Time!
item.dc:creator: @Madman906 Madman906
item.description:
@Madman906 wrote:

If the server isn’t on, then all of them must be off because this problem occurs with every server I try. I even go down the list trying around 30 servers. I am also making absolutely sure that I am using the correct ip and port that I am given. I don’t know about the flooding, but I know I’m not doing anything wrong. My friend has no problems with this, so he came over to my house to give it a shot. We were still having problems even after that.

Read full topic
item.source: Every Server is Down Almost All the Time!

item.title: Every Server is Down Almost All the Time!
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

The problems are either

1.) The server isnt actually on
2.) When you try to log into your server you leave the ip part blank OR fill in 127.0.0.0 ( i think )
3.) The server is currently is getting flooded and its wL
4.) Your doing something wrong

Read full topic
item.source: Every Server is Down Almost All the Time!

item.description:
@ProjectDiabolus wrote:

Use silabs client or make your own.

Read full topic
